title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node.
EB: Upon the second attempt to select the same item, it can be successfully selected.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item in the list.
3. Observe the focus jumping to the library file node instead of the selected item.
4. Repeat step 2 and observe that the item can be selected on the second attempt.
